definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: Acupuncture may cause just a little pain, but it also causes a certain feeling of numbness and distension.
sentences.chinese: 針刺只有輕微疼痛，它產生一定的麻和脹感。

sentences.english: A slight, metallic sound, as of coins rattling in a pocket.
sentences.chinese: 叮鐺聲一種象口袋中硬幣碰撞發出輕微。

sentences.english: In other places it seems he enjoyed the slight tremble and wander of his hand.
sentences.chinese: 而在其他地方，他似乎挺滿意手上輕微的顫抖和晃動。

sentences.english: Three people were hospitalized with minor lacerations.
sentences.chinese: 有三個人因輕微撕裂傷住院。

sentences.english: Only humming a little, the quiet sound in the head.
sentences.chinese: 哼哼小曲，腦子裏有一個輕微的聲音。

sentences.english: One afternoon someone noticed a slight yellowish-brown tint in the spring .
sentences.chinese: 一個下午某人在春天注意了輕微的淡黃棕色的色彩。

sentences.english: The patient has a mild fever.
sentences.chinese: 那個病人有些輕微的發燒。

sentences.english: It is recommended for women with mild to moderate prolapse.
sentences.chinese: 向有輕微到中等脫垂的女性推薦這種產品。

sentences.english: A slight char is also apparent, creating a very enticing aroma.
sentences.chinese: 一種輕微的焦糊味創造了誘人的香味。

sentences.english: The hospital has said, sword has a slight man hands cut, has put on the gauze.
sentences.chinese: 醫院方面稱，動刀男子雙手有輕微割傷，已纏上紗布。

sentences.english: He gets the occasional niggle in his right shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 他的右肩有時感到輕微的疼痛。

sentences.english: Is my blood depress slight and anaemic can you donate blood?
sentences.chinese: 我血壓低輕微貧血能獻血麼？

sentences.english: He oversleeps because of having a slight cold.
sentences.chinese: 他因爲輕微感冒而睡過了頭。

sentences.english: Highs will be around 77 degrees with light winds out of the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 高溫會在華氏77度左右且吹輕微東北風。

sentences.english: Angling a tom slightly causes sound waves to scatter, and diffuses them.
sentences.chinese: 輕微調節落地桶鼓的擺放角度使聲波散射和漫反射。

sentences.english: Police said she suffered only slight injuries from the traffic accident, including a small fracture to her left leg.
sentences.chinese: 警察說她在車禍中只受到輕傷，包括左腿輕微骨折。

definition: to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to compare/to dispute/compared to/(before adj.) relatively/comparatively/rather/also pr. [jiao3]
